title: Step 5: Resurrect Hero Models
text:
Place your Hero models (that were killed in the previous round) adjacent to your Effigy.

- y Return with -5 health than their maximum health.

- y Have -1AP during the round in which they resurrect.

- y Can Buy Magical Artefacts without spending 1AP during their activation (while adjacent to their Effigy).

If there are no unoccupied hexes adjacent to your Effigy, Heroes cannot resurrect.
